discourse_list.title: Deprecating EIP 1011 in favor of a Casper+Sharding design?

content.content: This is the proposal: https://notes.ethereum.org/SCIg8AH5SA-O4C1G1LYZHQ?view Summary of the deprecation: https://medium.com/@djrtwo/casper-️-sharding-28a90077f121 Said in the most light-hearted way that I can manage: I am reading this article about merging two complex initiatives as I reach for my paper copy of “The Mythical Man-Month”.
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the deprecation of EIP 1011 in favor of a Casper+Sharding design. The author provides a link to the proposal and a summary of the deprecation. The post also includes a lighthearted comment about the complexity of the initiatives.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Definitely need a concrete plan for testing each one of these ideas either atomically or after successfully proving any prerequisites. This is a much more complex proposal from Casper FFG, and requires more solid planning. For example, the random beacon chain could be something useful for a variety of games that require a source of randomness. Many different low stake use cases can show robustness before the entire network moves to the new design.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
